title: New Caledonia Le Méridien Beachfront Resort Overlooking World’s Largest Lagoon with Daily Resort Credit
description:
Immerse yourself in French sophistication on the golden shores of New Caledonia's capital at the spectacular Le Méridien Nouméa Resort & Spa. Perched on the edge of Anse Vata Bay, the resort boasts an unbeatable view of the world’s largest lagoon - recognised by UNESCO - along with effortless access to the surrounding pristine beaches. The influences of the French territory's background are carefully interwoven throughout the resort, from the eclectic art pieces adorning the walls to the flavours on offer at the onsite eateries - Le Sextant promises seafood favourites alongside beachfront views, while Le Faré's al fresco setting and lounge-style seating make it the perfect place to unwind with a cocktail in hand.

If you can pull yourself away from your luxurious accommodation, venture out to discover bustling Nouméa, taking in its unique mix of South Pacific beauty and European charm for yourself. High-end shopping awaits at Sebastopol Street and museums, art galleries, theatres and cinemas can be found around every corner. Further afield, hike up the majestic Mont-Dore for awe-inspiring panoramic views of the island. Return to the resort and enjoy a breather at the relaxing Deep Nature Spa, take a refreshing dip in the outdoor, palm-fringed swimming pool or explore the enormous double-barrier coral reef - the second longest in the world, outdone only by Australia's Great Barrier Reef.
offer_address: BP1915, 98846 Nouméa Cedex, Nouméa 98846 New Caledonia

title: Idyllic Noumea Resort Oasis on Anse Vata Bay with Resort Credit, Daily Breakfast & Kids Eat Free (Select Packages Only)
description: Experience the allure of French sophistication and Pacific island charm at Le Méridien Noumea Resort & Spa, a tropical haven nestled on the edge of the pristine Anse Vata Bay. Immerse yourself in the resort's luxurious pool, surrender to tranquillity with signature treatments at the Deep Nature Spa and savour the tantalising flavours of the Pacific at one of three onsite dining venues. Beyond the resort, explore the UNESCO World Heritage-listed lagoon, a breathtaking underwater world moments from your doorstep.
offer_address: BP1915, 98846 Nouméa Cedex, Nouméa 98846 New Caledonia

title: Tropical Nouméa Island Escape with Daily Breakfast, $A100 Spa Credit & Aquarium Entry
description:
Awake in the heart of Nouméa, where golden beaches meet shimmering turquoise waters, moments from your doorstep. Known for vibrant French and Melanesian culture and rich history, begin your day with the island’s flavours with a buffet breakfast, before diving into tropical adventures or sinking into the heated pool. Surrender to bliss and enjoy a A$100 spa credit, then retreat to your boutique haven and savour the island’s laid-back charm.

Nestled in a prime location, close to cozy cafes, unique shops and awe-inspiring lagoons, this is your dream escape to New Caledonia, where adventure meets peaceful relaxation. Discover the wonder of the Lagoon Aquarium with complimentary entry, and when it's time to leave your tropical oasis, enjoy a leisurely 12pm checkout.
offer_address: 149 route de l'Anse Vata, Nouméa 98800, New Caledonia
